Articles.Content:
Hello everyone,

I'm Captain Nakou and I have a little Youtube channel. I'm not here to advertise my (very little) channel, but because I'm looking for some material :

In my episodes, I introduce games, independent or not, and I like to introduce them in context. I talk about what the developers did before, why they've created the game, stuff like that.

So that's what I am looking for here : Is there anywhere here, or in the blog, the stories of "How KSP was made?" "How Squad got the idea?" "What push them to make this awesome game?". 
I can't find those information so I came here in case someone have seen content I can be interested into.

Nice Regards

CaptainNakou

Paging @Dr_Turkey, dr. Turkey to the operating forum.

@KasperVld could possibly help you too.

I've only been around since .90, but I will point you towards the old dev blog: http://kerbalspace.tumblr.com

Inside that blog, they have a series of posts about the pre-alpha phase of ksp: http://kerbalspace.tumblr.com/page/12

 

Hope that helps.

Luke

3 hours ago, lukethecoder64 said:

I've only been around since .90, but I will point you towards the old dev blog: http://kerbalspace.tumblr.com

Inside that blog, they have a series of posts about the pre-alpha phase of ksp: http://kerbalspace.tumblr.com/page/12

 

Hope that helps.

Luke

That's really good stuff you give me here. It's not exactly what I was looking for but it's definitely interesting.

Thanks for you answers anyway, I keep looking for infos and be around if someone have something cool.

I used to lurk on the Orbiter forums long ago and have some old Stuff from Filepe.  Looking through it it seems more like HarvesteR stalking.

 

https://www.physicsforums.com/threads/position-of-ascending-and-descending-nodes.534665/

http://i.imgur.com/08hdJyj.png

http://orbiter-forum.com/showthread.php?t=20494

17 hours ago, Nakou said:

So that's what I am looking for here : Is there anywhere here, or in the blog, the stories of "How KSP was made?" "How Squad got the idea?" "What push them to make this awesome game?".

Polygon had a lengthy feature on this last year. It probably doesn't include everything you're looking for, but it should get you started.

 

Edited December 8, 2015 by Streetwind

All of this, is absolutely fantastic. That's all I need for my episode, and more for ma curiosity :D.

Thank you so much guys, all of you!

I'll work on that now to write my episode, and I'll not forget how great the community is =D.

(I'm more a lurker so i'll go back to my place now)

NB : If you're interested in, I'll post my episode here, when it will be published, during the next month. It's in french BTW.
Also the about page on the tsp website.

18 hours ago, Streetwind said:

Polygon had a lengthy feature on this last year. It probably doesn't include everything you're looking for, but it should get you started.

 

That! Oh and who paged me? I was absolutely not sleeping.

I found this on the KSP wiki:

http://kerbalspace.tumblr.com/post/16228007762/the-story-of-ksp-ksp-01

http://kerbalspace.tumblr.com/post/16291223741/the-story-of-ksp-ksp-02

http://kerbalspace.tumblr.com/post/17096770707/the-story-of-ksp-ksp-03

http://kerbalspace.tumblr.com/post/17827181033/the-story-of-ksp-ksp-04

Hello guys!

My video is out! Thank you again, all of you, for helping me doing this. I've discover so much about this game because of you all.

Unfortunately it's in French so I wonder not so much people would be able to understand it but I though I must share it with you, because without you, there will be no video at all.

 

Cheer Guys! Love you!
